highlighted_projects.description: Conceptualized, strategized, and implemented a comprehensive full-stack application that allows users to find, manage, and create workouts that cater to users needs. Gym Junkie was made using the following tech stack: React and SASS for the front end and Node/Express backend API with JWT for auth, and Knex to query a MySQL database.

jarvis_projects.description: Implemented a monitoring agent that can track the hardware specifications and resource usage of machines in a Linux cluster and store the data inside a database. This monitoring agent is programming using technologies such as Bash, Docker, PostgreSQL, and Git and is tested using virtual machine instances running Rocky Linux 9 on the Google Cloud Platform(GCP).
jarvis_projects.name: Cluster Monitor
